name: generate-insights
description: Use this tool for exploratory data analysis, initial data exploration, or when you need a broad overview of your table, report_card, query result or curated metric, including key metrics and general trends. This is a good starting point for unspecific data analysis or exploration.

anyOf.description: Surface interesting patterns and insights for a pre-defined metric.

metric_id.description: The ID of the metric to analyze.

table_id.description: The ID of the table to analyze.

anyOf.description: Generate insights for the results of a saved report.

report_id.description: The ID of the report to analyze.

anyOf.description: Generate insights for the results of a query that recently has been run.

query_id.description: The ID of the query to analyze.

examples:
User: Explore the user acquisition costs (metric with id 928)
Assistant: {"tool_name": "generate-insights", "arguments": {"for": {"metric_id": 928}}}

User: Anything interesting in the orders table (order table id card_25)?
Assistant: {"tool_name": "generate-insights", "arguments": {"for": {"table_id": "card_25"}}}

User: Give me an overview of the results (query id "qwerboiahsdvcvhuowef")
Assistant: {"tool_name": "generate-insights", "arguments": {"for": {"query_id": "qwerboiahsdvcvhuowef"}}}

User: Any insights on the sales report (report id 1234)?
Assistant: {"tool_name": "generate-insights", "arguments": {"for": {"report_id": 1234}}}
